Sentencas: A new class of materials based on LaxSr1-xVO3-delta (LSV) has been studied as the anode for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) operating on H2S-containing fuels.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: The LSV-based anodes are chemically and electrochemically stable under SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: Furthermore, they appear to be active towards the preferential oxidation of H2S over hydrogen, as suggested by open circuit voltage, impedance spectra, and cell performance measurements using various H2S and H-2 fuel mixtures.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: A system with configuration LSV/YSZ/LSM-YSZ showed a maximum power density of 90 mW/cm(2) at 220 mA/cm(2) with a 5% H2S-95% N-2 fuel mixture at 1273 K.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: This same cell configuration showed a maximum power density of 135mW/cm(2) at 280mA/cm(2) when the fuel was a 5% H2S-95% H-2 mixture at 1273K. Cell performances were stable and showed no significant deterioration during a 48 h period.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: Impedance measurements showed overall cell resistances decreased with increasing temperature and H2S content of the fuel.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels

Sentencas: The results are promising due to the drastic improvement in sulfur tolerance compared to the current generation of SOFC anode materials.
Titulo: A solid oxide fuel cell operating on hydrogen sulfide (H2S) and sulfur-containing fuels
